global:
    external_labels:
        cluster: mindmend-cluster
        location: asia-southeast1-a
        project_id: mindmend-production
scrape_configs:
    - job_name: ClusterNodeMonitoring/gmp-kubelet-cadvisor/metrics/cadvisor
      honor_timestamps: false
      scrape_interval: 30s
      scrape_timeout: 30s
      metrics_path: /metrics/cadvisor
      scheme: https
      authorization:
        credentials_file: /var/run/secrets/kubernetes.io/serviceaccount/token
      tls_config:
        ca_file: /var/run/secrets/kubernetes.io/serviceaccount/ca.crt
        insecure_skip_verify: false
      follow_redirects: false
      enable_http2: false
      relabel_configs:
        - target_label: job
          replacement: gmp-kubelet-cadvisor
          action: replace
        - source_labels: [__meta_kubernetes_node_name]
          target_label: node
          action: replace
        - source_labels: [__meta_kubernetes_node_name]
          target_label: instance
          replacement: $1:metrics/cadvisor
          action: replace
        - target_label: project_id
          replacement: mindmend-production
          action: replace
        - target_label: location
          replacement: asia-southeast1-a
          action: replace
        - target_label: cluster
          replacement: mindmend-cluster
          action: replace
      metric_relabel_configs:
        - source_labels: [__name__]
          regex: container_cpu_cfs_periods_total|container_cpu_cfs_throttled_periods_total|container_cpu_usage_seconds_total|container_fs_limit_bytes|container_fs_read_seconds_total|container_fs_reads_bytes_total|container_fs_reads_total|container_fs_usage_bytes|container_fs_write_seconds_total|container_fs_writes_bytes_total|container_fs_writes_total|container_memory_rss|container_memory_working_set_bytes|container_network_receive_bytes_total|container_network_receive_packets_dropped_total|container_network_receive_packets_total|container_network_transmit_bytes_total|container_network_transmit_packets_dropped_total|container_network_transmit_packets_total
          action: keep
      kubernetes_sd_configs:
        - role: node
          kubeconfig_file: ""
          follow_redirects: true
          enable_http2: true
          selectors:
            - role: node
              field: metadata.name=$(NODE_NAME)
    - job_name: ClusterNodeMonitoring/gmp-kubelet-metrics/metrics
      honor_timestamps: false
      scrape_interval: 30s
      scrape_timeout: 30s
      metrics_path: /metrics
      scheme: https
      authorization:
        credentials_file: /var/run/secrets/kubernetes.io/serviceaccount/token
      tls_config:
        ca_file: /var/run/secrets/kubernetes.io/serviceaccount/ca.crt
        insecure_skip_verify: false
      follow_redirects: false
      enable_http2: false
      relabel_configs:
        - target_label: job
          replacement: gmp-kubelet-metrics
          action: replace
        - source_labels: [__meta_kubernetes_node_name]
          target_label: node
          action: replace
        - source_labels: [__meta_kubernetes_node_name]
          target_label: instance
          replacement: $1:metrics
          action: replace
        - target_label: project_id
          replacement: mindmend-production
          action: replace
        - target_label: location
          replacement: asia-southeast1-a
          action: replace
        - target_label: cluster
          replacement: mindmend-cluster
          action: replace
      metric_relabel_configs:
        - source_labels: [__name__]
          regex: kubelet_certificate_manager_server_ttl_seconds|kubelet_node_name|kubelet_pleg_relist_duration_seconds.*|kubelet_pod_worker_duration_seconds.*|kubelet_running_containers|kubelet_running_pods|kubelet_runtime_operations_total|kubelet_volume_stats_available_bytes|kubelet_volume_stats_capacity_bytes|kubelet_volume_stats_inodes|kubelet_volume_stats_inodes_free|kubelet_volume_stats_inodes_used|kubelet_volume_stats_used_bytes
          action: keep
      kubernetes_sd_configs:
        - role: node
          kubeconfig_file: ""
          follow_redirects: true
          enable_http2: true
          selectors:
            - role: node
              field: metadata.name=$(NODE_NAME)
    - job_name: ClusterPodMonitoring/gke-managed-dcgm-exporter/metrics
      honor_timestamps: false
      scrape_interval: 30s
      scrape_timeout: 30s
      metrics_path: /metrics
      follow_redirects: true
      enable_http2: true
      relabel_configs:
        - target_label: project_id
          replacement: mindmend-production
          action: replace
        - target_label: location
          replacement: asia-southeast1-a
          action: replace
        - target_label: cluster
          replacement: mindmend-cluster
          action: replace
        - source_labels: [__meta_kubernetes_pod_label_app_kubernetes_io_name]
          regex: gke-managed-dcgm-exporter
          action: keep
        - target_label: job
          replacement: gke-managed-dcgm-exporter
          action: replace
        - source_labels: [__meta_kubernetes_pod_phase]
          regex: (Failed|Succeeded)
          action: drop
        - source_labels: [__meta_kubernetes_pod_name]
          target_label: __tmp_instance
          action: replace
        - source_labels: [__meta_kubernetes_pod_controller_kind, __meta_kubernetes_pod_node_name]
          regex: DaemonSet;(.*)
          target_label: __tmp_instance
          replacement: $1
          action: replace
        - source_labels: [__meta_kubernetes_pod_container_port_name]
          regex: metrics
          action: keep
        - source_labels: [__tmp_instance, __meta_kubernetes_pod_container_port_name]
          regex: (.+);(.+)
          target_label: instance
          replacement: $1:$2
          action: replace
      kubernetes_sd_configs:
        - role: pod
          kubeconfig_file: ""
          follow_redirects: true
          enable_http2: true
          selectors:
            - role: pod
              field: spec.nodeName=$(NODE_NAME)
    - job_name: ClusterPodMonitoring/kube-state-metrics/k8s-objects
      honor_timestamps: false
      scrape_interval: 30s
      scrape_timeout: 30s
      metrics_path: /metrics
      follow_redirects: true
      enable_http2: true
      relabel_configs:
        - target_label: project_id
          replacement: mindmend-production
          action: replace
        - target_label: location
          replacement: asia-southeast1-a
          action: replace
        - target_label: cluster
          replacement: mindmend-cluster
          action: replace
        - source_labels: [__meta_kubernetes_pod_label_app_kubernetes_io_name]
          regex: gke-managed-kube-state-metrics
          action: keep
        - target_label: job
          replacement: kube-state-metrics
          action: replace
        - source_labels: [__meta_kubernetes_pod_phase]
          regex: (Failed|Succeeded)
          action: drop
        - source_labels: [__meta_kubernetes_pod_name]
          target_label: __tmp_instance
          action: replace
        - source_labels: [__meta_kubernetes_pod_controller_kind, __meta_kubernetes_pod_node_name]
          regex: DaemonSet;(.*)
          target_label: __tmp_instance
          replacement: $1
          action: replace
        - source_labels: [__meta_kubernetes_pod_container_port_name]
          regex: k8s-objects
          action: keep
        - source_labels: [__tmp_instance, __meta_kubernetes_pod_container_port_name]
          regex: (.+);(.+)
          target_label: instance
          replacement: $1:$2
          action: replace
      metric_relabel_configs:
        - source_labels: [namespace]
          regex: gke-managed-.*
          action: drop
      kubernetes_sd_configs:
        - role: pod
          kubeconfig_file: ""
          follow_redirects: true
          enable_http2: true
          selectors:
            - role: pod
              field: spec.nodeName=$(NODE_NAME)

data.core-metrics-exporter-config:
receivers:
  kubenode:
    endpoint: "https://$KUBELET_HOST:10250"
    scrape_interval: 60s
    cluster_name: mindmend-cluster
    location: asia-southeast1-a
    node_name: "$NODE_NAME"
    kubernetes_service_host: "$KUBERNETES_SERVICE_HOST"
    certificate_location: "/var/run/secrets/kubernetes.io/serviceaccount/ca.crt"
    use_watch: true
  prometheus/nostarttime:
    use_start_time_metric: false
    config:
      scrape_configs:
      - job_name: "self-observability"
        scrape_interval: 60s
        static_configs:
        - targets: ["$HOST_LOOPBACK:8200"]
        metric_relabel_configs:
        - source_labels: [ __name__ ]
          target_label: gke_component_name
          replacement: "addons/gke_metrics_agent"
        - source_labels: [__name__]
          target_label: container
          replacement: "gke-metrics-agent"
        - source_labels: [__name__]
          target_label: pod
          replacement: "$POD_NAME"
        - source_labels: [__name__]
          target_label: namespace
          replacement: "$POD_NAMESPACE"
        
        - source_labels: [__name__]
          regex: "grpc_io_client_(completed_rpcs|roundtrip_latency_.*)"
          target_label: otelsvc_exporter
          replacement: "googlecloud"
        
        - source_labels: [exporter]
          target_label: otelsvc_exporter
          replacement: ${ARG1}
          regex: "(.+)"
        - source_labels: [receiver]
          target_label: otelsvc_receiver
          replacement: ${ARG1}
          regex: "(.*)"
        - source_labels: [processor]
          target_label: otelsvc_processor
          replacement: ${ARG1}
          regex: "(.*)"
        - regex: "service_name|service_instance_id|service_version|receiver|processor|exporter|transport"
          action: labeldrop
      - job_name: "self-observability-core-metrics"
        scrape_interval: 60s
        static_configs:
        - targets: ["$HOST_LOOPBACK:8202"]
        metric_relabel_configs:
        - source_labels: [ __name__ ]
          target_label: gke_component_name
          replacement: "addons/gke_metrics_agent"
        - source_labels: [__name__]
          target_label: container
          replacement: "core-metrics-exporter"
        - source_labels: [__name__]
          target_label: pod
          replacement: "$POD_NAME"
        - source_labels: [__name__]
          target_label: namespace
          replacement: "$POD_NAMESPACE"
        
        - source_labels: [__name__]
          regex: "grpc_io_client_(completed_rpcs|roundtrip_latency_.*)"
          target_label: otelsvc_exporter
          replacement: "googlecloud"
        
        - source_labels: [exporter]
          target_label: otelsvc_exporter
          replacement: ${ARG1}
          regex: "(.+)"
        - source_labels: [receiver]
          target_label: otelsvc_receiver
          replacement: ${ARG1}
          regex: "(.*)"
        - source_labels: [processor]
          target_label: otelsvc_processor
          replacement: ${ARG1}
          regex: "(.*)"
        - regex: "service_name|service_instance_id|service_version|receiver|processor|exporter|transport"
          action: labeldrop
  prometheus:
    use_start_time_metric: true
    start_time_metric_regex: "^(.+_)*process_start_time_seconds$"
    allowed_metric_names:
      "process_start_time_seconds": {}
    config:
      scrape_configs:
      - job_name: "addons"
        scrape_interval: 60s
        kubernetes_sd_configs:
        - role: pod
          namespaces:
            names:
            - "kube-system"
            # Only ever used in GKE Autopilot.
            - gke-gmp-system
            # Only ever used in GKE Standard.
            - gmp-system
          selectors:
          - role: pod
            field: "spec.nodeName=$NODE_NAME,status.phase=Running"
        relabel_configs:
        - source_labels: [ __meta_kubernetes_pod_container_port_name ]
          regex: ".*metrics"
          action: keep
        - source_labels: [ __meta_kubernetes_pod_annotation_components_gke_io_component_name ]
          regex: "^(fluentbit|managed-prometheus)$"
          action: keep
        - source_labels: [ __meta_kubernetes_pod_annotationpresent_monitoring_gke_io_path, __meta_kubernetes_pod_annotation_monitoring_gke_io_path ]
          regex: "true;(.*)"
          target_label: __metrics_path__
        - source_labels: []
          replacement: true
          target_label: __per_container_metric
        - source_labels: [ __meta_kubernetes_pod_annotation_components_gke_io_component_name ]
          target_label: gke_component_name
          replacement: "addons/${ARG1}"
        - source_labels: [ __meta_kubernetes_pod_name, __per_container_metric ]
          regex: "(.*);true"
          target_label: pod
        - source_labels: [ __meta_kubernetes_pod_container_name, __per_container_metric ]
          regex: "(.*);true"
          target_label: container
        - source_labels: [ __meta_kubernetes_namespace, __per_container_metric ]
          regex: "(.*);true"
          target_label: namespace
        - source_labels: [ gke_component_name ]
          target_label: gke_component_name
          regex: "(.*)-(.*)"
          replacement: "${ARG1}_${ARG2}"
processors:
  batch:
    send_batch_max_size: 200
    send_batch_size: 200
    timeout: 15s
  resource:
    attributes:
    - key: opencensus.resourcetype
      action: upsert
      value: "host"
    - key: cloud.zone
      action: upsert
      value: asia-southeast1-a
    - key: host.name
      action: upsert
      value: "$NODE_NAME"
    - key: k8s.cluster.name
      action: upsert
      value: mindmend-cluster
  metrics_export:
    common_prefix: "kubernetes.io/internal"
    detect_container_metrics: true
    
    allowed_labels:
    - "project"
    - "location"
    - "cluster_name"
    - "node_name"
    - "namespace"
    - "pod"
    - "container"
    export_map:
    - "kubernetes.io/internal/addons/gke_metrics_agent/otelcol_receiver_accepted_metric_points":
        allowed_labels:
        - "otelsvc_receiver"
        export_name: "kubernetes.io/internal/addons/gke_otelsvc/receiver/received_timeseries"
        export_as_int: true
    - "kubernetes.io/internal/addons/gke_metrics_agent/otelcol_receiver_refused_metric_points":
        allowed_labels:
        - "otelsvc_receiver"
        export_name: "kubernetes.io/internal/addons/gke_otelsvc/receiver/dropped_timeseries"
        export_as_int: true
    - "kubernetes.io/internal/addons/gke_metrics_agent/receiver_accepted_metric_points":
        allowed_labels:
        - "otelsvc_receiver"
        export_name: "kubernetes.io/internal/addons/gke_otelsvc/receiver/received_timeseries"
        export_as_int: true
    - "kubernetes.io/internal/addons/gke_metrics_agent/receiver_refused_metric_points":
       allowed_labels:
       - "otelsvc_receiver"
       export_name: "kubernetes.io/internal/addons/gke_otelsvc/receiver/dropped_timeseries"
       export_as_int: true
    - "kubernetes.io/internal/addons/gke_metrics_agent/processor_accepted_metric_points":
       allowed_labels:
       - "otelsvc_processor"
       export_name: "kubernetes.io/internal/addons/gke_otelsvc/processor/received_timeseries_count"
       export_as_int: true
    - "kubernetes.io/internal/addons/gke_metrics_agent/processor_dropped_metric_points":
       allowed_labels:
       - "otelsvc_processor"
       export_name: "kubernetes.io/internal/addons/gke_otelsvc/processor/dropped_timeseries_count"
       export_as_int: true
    - "kubernetes.io/internal/addons/gke_metrics_agent/processor_refused_metric_points":
       allowed_labels:
       - "otelsvc_processor"
       export_name: "kubernetes.io/internal/addons/gke_otelsvc/processor/refused_timeseries_count"
       export_as_int: true
    - "kubernetes.io/internal/addons/gke_metrics_agent/exporter_sent_metric_points":
       allowed_labels:
       - "otelsvc_exporter"
       export_name: "kubernetes.io/internal/addons/gke_otelsvc/exporter/received_timeseries"
       export_as_int: true
    - "kubernetes.io/internal/addons/gke_metrics_agent/exporter_send_failed_metric_points":
       allowed_labels:
       - "otelsvc_exporter"
       export_name: "kubernetes.io/internal/addons/gke_otelsvc/exporter/dropped_timeseries"
       export_as_int: true
    - "kubernetes.io/internal/addons/gke_metrics_agent/http_client_roundtrip_latency":
       allowed_labels:
       - "otelsvc_receiver"
       - "http_client_host"
       export_name: "kubernetes.io/internal/addons/gke_otelsvc/http/client/roundtrip_latency"

    - "kubernetes.io/internal/addons/gke_metrics_agent/grpc_io_client_completed_rpcs":

    - "kubernetes.io/internal/addons/gke_metrics_agent/grpc_io_client_roundtrip_latency":

       export_as_int: true
    - "kubernetes.io/internal/addons/gke_metrics_agent/cache_operation_count":
       allowed_labels:

       export_name: "kubernetes.io/internal/addons/gke_otelsvc/cache/operation_count"

    - "kubernetes.io/internal/addons/gke_metrics_agent/cache_operation_duration":

    - "kubernetes.io/internal/addons/fluentbit/fluentbit_stackdriver_output_records_latency_seconds":
        allowed_labels:

exporters:
  googlecloud:
    endpoint: monitoring.googleapis.com:443
    timeout: 45s
    retry_on_failure:
      enabled: false
    sending_queue:
      enabled: false
    
    metric:
      skip_create_descriptor: true
    
extensions:
  observability:
    metrics_export_enabled: false
  health_check:
    endpoint: "0.0.0.0:8203"
service:
  extensions:
  - observability
  
  - health_check
  pipelines:
    metrics/kube:
      receivers:
        - kubenode
      exporters:
        - googlecloud
    metrics/prom:
      receivers:
        - prometheus
        - prometheus/nostarttime
      processors:
        - resource
        - metrics_export
        - batch
      exporters:
        - googlecloud

data.efficiency-daemon-config.yaml:
drivers:
- cpu_limits
- memory_limits
- cpuset_cpus
- ek_cpu_limits
cpuBuffer: 0m
cpuMinLimit: 840m
memoryBuffer: 200Mi
memoryBufferPerGiNodeCapacity: 4.5Mi
memoryMinLimit: 1.5Gi
managedNamespaces:
- kube-system
- gke-gmp-system
- gke-managed-cim

data.fluent-bit.conf:
[SERVICE]
    Flush         5
    Grace         120
    Log_Level     info
    
    Log_File      /var/log/fluentbit.log
    Daemon        off
    Parsers_File  parsers.conf
    HTTP_Server   On
    HTTP_Listen   0.0.0.0
    HTTP_PORT     2020


[INPUT]
    Name             tail
    Alias            kube_containers_kube-system
    Tag              kube_<namespace_name>_<pod_name>_<container_name>
    Tag_Regex        (?<pod_name>[a-z0-9]([-a-z0-9]*[a-z0-9])?(\.[a-z0-9]([-a-z0-9]*[a-z0-9])?)*)_(?<namespace_name>[^_]+)_(?<container_name>.+)-
    Path             /var/log/containers/*_kube-system_*.log
    DB               /var/lib/google-fluentbit/pos-files/flb_kube_kube-system.db
    Buffer_Max_Size  1MB
    Mem_Buf_Limit    5MB
    Skip_Long_Lines  On
    Refresh_Interval 5
    Read_from_Head   True

# This input is used  to watch changes to Kubernetes pod log files live in the

[FILTER]
    Name                lua
    Alias               redact-kubelet-lua
    Match               kubelet
    Script              redact_kubelet.lua
    Call                redact_sensitive_info

[FILTER]
    Name               modify
    Match              kubelet
    Alias              kubelet_remove_cmdline
    Remove             _CMDLINE


[FILTER]
    Name        modify
    Match       *
    Hard_rename log message

[FILTER]
    Name         parser
    Match        kube_*
    Key_Name     message
    Reserve_Data True
    Parser       glog
    Parser       json

# level is a common synonym for severity,
# the default field name in libraries such as GoLang's zap.
# populate severity with level, if severity does not exist.
[FILTER]
    Name        modify
    Match       kube_*
    Copy        level severity

[OUTPUT]
    Name        http
    Match       *
    Host        127.0.0.1
    Port        2021
    URI         /logs
    header_tag  FLUENT-TAG
    Format      msgpack
    Retry_Limit 2
data.parsers.conf:
[PARSER]
    Name        containerd
    Format      regex
    # The timestamp is described in https://www.rfc-editor.org/rfc/rfc3339#section-5.6
    # Containerd logs follow the pattern of CRI Log Format (https://github.com/kubernetes/design-proposals-archive/blob/main/node/kubelet-cri-logging.md): <timestamp> <stream> <tag> <message>
    # F in tag means "Full Log", and P means "Partial Log".
    Regex       ^(?<time>[0-9]{4}-[0-9]{2}-[0-9]{2}[Tt ][0-9]{2}:[0-9]{2}:[0-9]{2}(?:\.[0-9]+)?(?:[Zz]|[+-][0-9]{2}:[0-9]{2}))\s+(?<stream>stdout|stderr)\s(F|P)\s(?<log>.*)$
    Time_Key    time
    Time_Format %Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%S.%L%z

[PARSER]
    Name        json
    Format      json

[PARSER]
    Name        syslog
    Format      regex
    Regex       ^\<(?<pri>[0-9]+)\>(?<time>[^ ]* {1,2}[^ ]* [^ ]*) (?<host>[^ ]*) (?<ident>[a-zA-Z0-9_\/\.\-]*)(?:\[(?<pid>[0-9]+)\])?(?:[^\:]*\:)? *(?<message>.*)$
    Time_Key    time
    Time_Format %b %d %H:%M:%S

[PARSER]
    Name        glog
    Format      regex
    # We skip the glog timestamp as it doesn't have year (in most cases) and time zone information.
    # Instead, we rely on the containerd timestamp, which is available for every log line.
    Regex       ^(?<severity>\w)\d{4}?\d{4} [^\s]*\s+(?<pid>\d+)\s+(?<source_file>[^ \]]+)\:(?<source_line>\d+)\]\s(?<message>.*)$

[PARSER]
    Name        network-log
    Format      json
    Time_Key    timestamp
    Time_Format %Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%S.%L%z

# Example:
# [2023/01/05 00:01:58] [ info] [output:http:http.0] 127.0.0.1:2021, HTTP status=200\
# Rubular: https://screenshot.googleplex.com/8SvHiZJLUkW9idQ
[PARSER]
    Name   fluentbit
    Format regex
    Regex  ^\[(?<time>[^\]]+)\][ ]*\[[ ]*(?<severity>[^\]]+)\][ ]*\[(?<plugin>[^\]]+)\] (?<log>.*)
    Time_Key time
    Time_Format %Y/%m/%d %H:%M:%S
data.redact_kubelet.lua:
function redact_sensitive_info(tag, timestamp, record)
  message = record["MESSAGE"]
  if message then
    if string.find(message, "access_token=ya29.[a-zA-Z0-9._-]*") then
      local redact_message = string.gsub(message, "access_token=ya29.[a-zA-Z0-9._-]*", "access_token=<REDACTED>")
      record["MESSAGE"] = redact_message
      return 2, timestamp, record
    end
  end
  return 0, timestamp, record
end

data.gke-metrics-agent-config:
receivers:
  prometheus/resourcemetrics:
    use_start_time_metric: false
    config:
      scrape_configs:
      - job_name: "resources"
        scrape_interval: 15s
        static_configs:
        - targets: ["$KUBELET_HOST:10250"]
        scheme: "https"
        authorization:
          type: "Bearer"
          credentials_file: "/var/run/secrets/kubernetes.io/serviceaccount/token"
        tls_config:
          ca_file: "/var/run/secrets/kubernetes.io/serviceaccount/ca.crt"
        metrics_path: "metrics/resource"
        metric_relabel_configs:
        - source_labels: [ __name__ ]
          regex: "container_memory_working_set_bytes|container_cpu_usage_seconds_total"
          action: keep
        - source_labels: [ __name__ ]
          regex: "container_memory_working_set_bytes"
          target_label: "memory_type"
          replacement: "non-evictable"
exporters:
  uas:
    endpoint: asia-southeast1-autoscaling.googleapis.com:443
    location: asia-southeast1-a
    cluster_name: mindmend-cluster
    project: 840448055519
    is_multi_tenant_cluster: false
    scrape_interval: 15s
    gke_hostname: container.googleapis.com
processors:
  resource:
    attributes:
    - key: opencensus.resourcetype
      action: upsert
      value: "host"
    - key: cloud.zone
      action: upsert
      value: asia-southeast1-a
    - key: host.name
      action: upsert
      value: "$NODE_NAME"
    - key: k8s.cluster.name
      action: upsert
      value: mindmend-cluster
  metrics_export/resource:
    detect_container_metrics: true
    allowed_labels:
    - "project"
    - "location"
    - "cluster_name"
    - "node_name"
    - "namespace"
    - "pod"
    - "container"
    export_map:
    - "container_memory_working_set_bytes":
        export_name: "kubernetes.io/container/memory/used_bytes"
    - "container_cpu_usage_seconds_total":
        export_name: "kubernetes.io/container/cpu/core_usage_time"
extensions:
  observability:
    metrics_export_enabled: false
  health_check:
    endpoint: "$HOST_LOOPBACK:8201"
service:
  extensions:
  - observability
  
  - health_check
  pipelines:
    
    metrics/resource_uas:
      receivers:
      - prometheus/resourcemetrics
      processors:
      - resource
      - metrics_export/resource
      exporters:
       - uas

annotations.kubernetes.io/description: Contains a CA bundle that can be used to verify the kube-apiserver when using internal endpoints such as the internal service IP or kubernetes.default.svc. No other usage is guaranteed across distributions of Kubernetes clusters.
